channel.title: I could use some help with
channel.description:
Hey guys i need some help i'm setting up a 317 server but its not working so well i have it running but i can't do the following.. :( 1)i can't give myself Owner of server. 2)if i do give my character Admin i dont have crown near name. 3)Exp does not work at all. 4)Npc wont lose hp and i can't attack some of them. 5)I dont know how to add shops and items. 6)For some reason i have commands added but most will not work.
Thats all i need help with for now if you could help please i will be extremely grateful. :)

item.title: I could use some help with

@XxicemanxX wrote:

Thanks for the help bro IOU one =]

item.title: I could use some help with
item.dc:creator: @supra_s supra s
item.description:
@supra_s wrote:

Next time post in “server help” http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,48.0.html

“server name” -> characters -> open your name -> character-rights = 0

change to ->
1 = mod
2 = admin
3 = owner

  1. see 1

  2. exp does not work ? what server did u use as base?

  3. search for “npc.cfg”
    looking at the following code u will understand.
    // NpcID NpcName combat health respawn
    npc = 0 Hans 0 0

  4. Look in tutorial section.

  5. it could be only players with the right “player-rights” can use them or when its like :
    command.equalsIgnoreCase(“supra s”)
    its name based only the player with that name can access the code

Read full topic

item.title: I could use some help with

item.description:
@XxicemanxX wrote:

Hey guys i need some help i’m setting up a 317 server but its not working so well i have it running but i can’t do the following…
1)i can’t give myself Owner of server.
2)if i do give my character Admin i dont have crown near name.
3)Exp does not work at all.
4)Npc wont lose hp and i can’t attack some of them.
5)I dont know how to add shops and items.
6)For some reason i have commands added but most will not work.

Thats all i need help with for now if you could help please i will be extremely grateful.
